village_square.name: Village Square of Eldergrove
village_square.description: A peaceful village square with a fountain at its center. Villagers go about their daily business.

forest_path.name: Dark Forest Path
forest_path.description: An overgrown path leading into a dense, mysterious forest. Strange sounds echo from within.

dragon_cave.name: Ancient Dragon's Lair
dragon_cave.description: A massive cave entrance carved with ancient runes. Heat and smoke billow from within.

tavern.name: The Rusty Sword Tavern
tavern.description: A cozy tavern filled with the smell of ale and roasted meat. Adventurers share stories by the fireplace.

blacksmith.name: Ironforge Smithy
blacksmith.description: The rhythmic clanging of hammer on anvil fills the air. Weapons and armor line the walls.

village_elder.name: Elder Thornwick
village_elder.quest: The village needs a hero to investigate the dragon threatening their lands

ancient_dragon.name: Vorthax the Ancient
ancient_dragon.personality: Intelligent and cunning, not immediately hostile
ancient_dragon.quest: His treasure was stolen by thieves from the village

blacksmith.name: Grimgar Ironforge
blacksmith.quest: Can craft a legendary weapon if you bring dragon scales

innkeeper.name: Bella Hopsworth
innkeeper.quest: Knows rumors about the dragon and the stolen treasure

old_warrior.name: Sir Aldric
old_warrior.quest: Will teach you a special combat technique

rusty_sword.name: Rusty Sword
rusty_sword.description: An old sword, but better than nothing

story_arcs.intro: Player arrives in village, learns about dragon threat
story_arcs.investigation: Player gathers information, meets NPCs, prepares
story_arcs.forest_encounter: Player ventures to forest, meets mysterious stranger
story_arcs.dragon_confrontation: Player reaches dragon, discovers truth about stolen treasure
story_arcs.resolution: Player resolves conflict (fight, negotiate, or recover treasure)
